Minimum:
  • OS: 32/64 bit Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 32/64 bit Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7+
  • Processor: Intel Pentium+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes:

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Pentium(R) CPU G4600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX550/550 Series
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64bit)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64bit)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or greater (only Oculus Rift, for Vive see Recomended spec)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or greater (only Oculus Rift, for Vive see Recomended spec)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
  • Additional Notes: Supported Devices: Quest 1 & 2 Link, Oculus Rift S, Oculus Rift, Quest 3 Link, Quest Pro Link, Valve Index, HTC Vive Pro, HTC Vive, Pimax 5k, HP Reverb G2
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700K equivalent or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 or greater
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
